title: SlashTHEM races
data:
In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), there are a total of 19 **playable [races](/wiki/Race "Race")**:

- The 5 base races from *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")* - [dwarf](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)"), [elf](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)"), [human](/wiki/Human_\(starting_race\) "Human (starting race)"), [gnome](/wiki/Gnome_\(starting_race\) "Gnome (starting race)"), and [orc](/wiki/Orc_\(starting_race\) "Orc (starting race)");
- the 5 additional races from [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") - [doppelgänger](/wiki/Doppelganger_\(starting_race\) "Doppelganger (starting race)"), [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)"), [hobbit](/wiki/Hobbit_\(starting_race\) "Hobbit (starting race)"), [lycanthrope](/wiki/Lycanthrope_\(starting_race\) "Lycanthrope (starting race)"), [vampire](/wiki/Vampire_\(starting_race_in_SLASH%27EM\) "Vampire (starting race in SLASH'EM)"); and
- 9 new playable races introduced by SlashTHEM, either entirely new or inherited from [Slash'EM Extended](/wiki/Slash%27EM_Extended "Slash'EM Extended") - [Clockwork automaton](/wiki/Clockwork_automaton_\(starting_race\) "Clockwork automaton (starting race)"), [ghoul](/wiki/Ghoul_\(starting_race\) "Ghoul (starting race)"), [giant](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)"), [illithid](/wiki/Illithid_\(starting_race\) "Illithid (starting race)") ([mind flayer](/wiki/Mind_flayer "Mind flayer")), [incantifier](/wiki/Incantifier "Incantifier"), [kobold](/wiki/Kobold_\(starting_race\) "Kobold (starting race)"), [nymph](/wiki/Nymph_\(starting_race\) "Nymph (starting race)"), [ogre](/wiki/Ogre_\(starting_race\) "Ogre (starting race)"), [troll](/wiki/Troll_\(starting_race\) "Troll (starting race)")

## Attribute limits

| race                | Str    | Dex | Con | Int | Wis | Cha |
| ------------------- | ------ | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| clockwork automaton | 18/100 | 18  | 18  | 18  | 18  | 18  |
| doppelgänger        | 18/100 | 20  | 20  | 20  | 20  | 15  |
| drow                | 18     | 18  | 16  | 20  | 20  | 18  |
| dwarf               | 18/100 | 20  | 20  | 16  | 16  | 16  |
| elf                 | 18     | 18  | 16  | 20  | 20  | 18  |
| ghoul               | 19     | 15  | 18  | 17  | 17  | 15  |
| giant               | 25     | 15  | 20  | 17  | 17  | 16  |
| gnome               | 18     | 18  | 20  | 16  | 18  | 20  |
| hobbit              | 18     | 18  | 20  | 16  | 18  | 20  |
| human               | 18/100 | 18  | 18  | 18  | 18  | 18  |
| illithid            | 18     | 18  | 17  | 25  | 23  | 16  |
| incantifier         | 18/100 | 18  | 18  | 18  | 18  | 18  |
| kobold              | 17     | 20  | 18  | 17  | 16  | 16  |
| lycanthrope         | 19     | 20  | 19  | 15  | 15  | 15  |
| nymph               | 16     | 25  | 15  | 18  | 18  | 25  |
| ogre                | 23     | 15  | 20  | 15  | 15  | 15  |
| orc                 | 18/50  | 18  | 18  | 16  | 16  | 16  |
| troll               | 23     | 16  | 25  | 17  | 15  | 15  |
| vampire             | 19     | 20  | 20  | 18  | 18  | 20  |

## Racial intrinsics

Each race has various intrinsics, unique abilities and weaknesses that are detailed in the table below. They also gain a [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack")-style boost to certain [skills](/wiki/Skill "Skill"), with their minimum caps in parentheses - if a monster of a listed race is paired with a role that has a boosted skill, that skill's cap will be one level higher. It works by giving Basic training in or unrestricting the skills, and increasing the limits to the listed minimum, or at least 1 higher. The exceptions are gnomes (who can reach only Basic in pick-axe) and lycanthropes ([bare-handed combat](/wiki/Bare-handed_combat "Bare-handed combat") is increased by 2 steps). The spell schools for illithids and incantifiers obviously can’t go beyond Expert.

| Race                         | Intrinsics by [XL](/wiki/XL "XL")                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Skills (standard cap)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| ---------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| clockwork automaton          | 1: poison, sickness and stoning resistance 5: [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance") 10: [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance") 15: [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") | [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword") (Basic)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| doppelgänger                 | 25: [polymorph control](/wiki/Polymorph_control "Polymorph control")                                                                                                                                                                      | [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") (Basic) unless [Caveperson](/wiki/Caveperson "Caveperson") [body spells](/wiki/Body_spells "Body spells") (Skilled)                                                                                                                                  |
| drow                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [saber](/wiki/Saber "Saber") (Basic) [musicalize spells](/wiki/Musicalize_spell "Musicalize spell") (Basic) [bow](/wiki/Bow "Bow") (Skilled)                                                                                                                                         |
| dwarf                        |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [pick-axe](/wiki/Pick-axe "Pick-axe") (Skilled) [axe](/wiki/Axe "Axe") (Skilled) [hammer](/wiki/Hammer "Hammer") (Skilled)                                                                                                                                                           |
| elf                          | 4: [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance")                                                                                                                                                                          | [bow](/wiki/Bow "Bow") (Skilled) [musicalize spell](/wiki/Musicalize_spell "Musicalize spell") (Skilled)                                                                                                                                                                             |
| ghoul                        | 1: sickness, cold, sleep, and poison resistance                                                                                                                                                                                           | [bare-handed combat](/wiki/Bare-handed_combat "Bare-handed combat") (Skilled) [attack spells](/wiki/Attack_spells "Attack spells") (Basic)                                                                                                                                           |
| giant                        | 10: [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") 15: [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance") 20: [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance")                                           | [two-weapon combat](/wiki/Two-weapon_combat "Two-weapon combat") (Skilled) [two-handed sword](/wiki/Two-handed_sword "Two-handed sword") (Skilled) unless [Caveperson](/wiki/Caveperson "Caveperson")                                                                                |
| gnome                        | 5: [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth") 9: [speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed") 11: [searching](/wiki/Searching "Searching")                                                                                                                        | [club](/wiki/Club "Club") (Basic) [pick-axe](/wiki/Pick-axe "Pick-axe") (max. Basic)                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [human](/wiki/Human "Human") | none                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | none                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| hobbit                       | 1 [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth") 7 [speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")                                                                                                                                                                       | [sling](/wiki/Sling "Sling") (Skilled)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| illithid                     | 1 [telepathy](/wiki/Telepathy "Telepathy") 5 extrinsic elepathy                                                                                                                                                                           | [attack spells](/wiki/Attack_spells "Attack spells") (Expert) [divination spells](/wiki/Divination_spells "Divination spells") (Skilled) [enchantment spells](/wiki/Enchantment_spells "Enchantment spells") (Skilled) [matter spells](/wiki/Matter_spells "Matter spells") (Expert) |
| incantifier                  | 1: [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance")                                                                                                                                                                          | all 7 spell schools (Expert)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| kobold                       | 1: [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance")                                                                                                                                                                       | [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear") (Basic) [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") (Basic) unless [Caveperson](/wiki/Caveperson "Caveperson") [dart](/wiki/Dart "Dart") (Basic)                                                                                                                    |
| lycanthrope                  | 1: [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), [regeneration](/wiki/Regeneration "Regeneration") 7: [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth")                                                                              | [bare-handed combat](/wiki/Bare-handed_combat "Bare-handed combat") (+2 levels, min. Expert) [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword") (Skilled)                                                                                                                                |
| nymph                        | 1: [teleportitis](/wiki/Teleportitis "Teleportitis") 15: [teleport control](/wiki/Teleport_control "Teleport control")                                                                                                                    | [healing spells](/wiki/Healing_spells "Healing spells") (Basic) [musicalize spell](/wiki/Musicalize_spell "Musicalize spell") (Skilled)                                                                                                                                              |
| ogre                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [club](/wiki/Club "Club") (Skilled)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| orc                          | 1: [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance")                                                                                                                                                                       | [scimitar](/wiki/Scimitar "Scimitar") (Skilled)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| troll                        | 1: [sickness resistance](/wiki/Sickness_resistance "Sickness resistance"), [regeneration](/wiki/Regeneration "Regeneration")                                                                                                              | [polearms](/wiki/Polearms "Polearms") (Skilled)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| vampire                      | none                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | [bare-handed combat](/wiki/Bare-handed_combat "Bare-handed combat") (Basic) [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") (Basic) [knife](/wiki/Knife "Knife") (Basic)                                                                                                                             |

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"can trolls not get fire resistance like in SLEX?"*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
SlashTHEM races

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

In SlashTHEM, there are a total of 19 playable races:

  • The 5 base races from NetHack - dwarf, elf, human, gnome, and orc;
  • the 5 additional races from SLASH'EM - doppelgänger, drow, hobbit, lycanthrope, vampire; and
  • 9 new playable races introduced by SlashTHEM, either entirely new or inherited from Slash'EM Extended - Clockwork automaton, ghoul, giant, illithid (mind flayer), incantifier, kobold, nymph, ogre, troll

Attribute limits

race Str Dex Con Int Wis Cha
clockwork automaton 18/100 18 18 18 18 18
doppelgänger 18/100 20 20 20 20 15
drow 18 18 16 20 20 18
dwarf 18/100 20 20 16 16 16
elf 18 18 16 20 20 18
ghoul 19 15 18 17 17 15
giant 25 15 20 17 17 16
gnome 18 18 20 16 18 20
hobbit 18 18 20 16 18 20
human 18/100 18 18 18 18 18
illithid 18 18 17 25 23 16
incantifier 18/100 18 18 18 18 18
kobold 17 20 18 17 16 16
lycanthrope 19 20 19 15 15 15
nymph 16 25 15 18 18 25
ogre 23 15 20 15 15 15
orc 18/50 18 18 16 16 16
troll 23 16 25 17 15 15
vampire 19 20 20 18 18 20

Racial intrinsics

Each race has various intrinsics, unique abilities and weaknesses that are detailed in the table below. They also gain a dNetHack-style boost to certain skills, with their minimum caps in parentheses - if a monster of a listed race is paired with a role that has a boosted skill, that skill's cap will be one level higher. It works by giving Basic training in or unrestricting the skills, and increasing the limits to the listed minimum, or at least 1 higher. The exceptions are gnomes (who can reach only Basic in pick-axe) and lycanthropes (bare-handed combat is increased by 2 steps). The spell schools for illithids and incantifiers obviously can’t go beyond Expert.

Race Intrinsics by XL Skills (standard cap)
clockwork automaton 1: poison, sickness and stoning resistance
5: shock resistance
10: cold resistance
15: fire resistance		 long sword (Basic)
doppelgänger 25: polymorph control dagger (Basic) unless Caveperson
body spells (Skilled)
drow saber (Basic)
musicalize spells (Basic)
bow (Skilled)
dwarf pick-axe (Skilled)
axe (Skilled)
hammer (Skilled)
elf 4: sleep resistance bow (Skilled)
musicalize spell (Skilled)
ghoul 1: sickness, cold, sleep, and poison resistance bare-handed combat (Skilled)
attack spells (Basic)
giant 10: fire resistance
15: cold resistance
20: shock resistance		 two-weapon combat (Skilled)
two-handed sword (Skilled) unless Caveperson
gnome 5: stealth
9: speed
11: searching		 club (Basic)
pick-axe (max. Basic)
human none none
hobbit 1 stealth
7 speed		 sling (Skilled)
illithid 1 telepathy
5 extrinsic elepathy		 attack spells (Expert)
divination spells (Skilled)
enchantment spells (Skilled)
matter spells (Expert)
incantifier 1: magic resistance all 7 spell schools (Expert)
kobold 1: poison resistance spear (Basic)
dagger (Basic) unless Caveperson
dart (Basic)
lycanthrope 1: poison resistance, regeneration
7: stealth		 bare-handed combat (+2 levels, min. Expert)
short sword (Skilled)
nymph 1: teleportitis
15: teleport control		 healing spells (Basic)
musicalize spell (Skilled)
ogre club (Skilled)
orc 1: poison resistance scimitar (Skilled)
troll 1: sickness resistance, regeneration polearms (Skilled)
vampire none bare-handed combat (Basic)
dagger (Basic)
knife (Basic)

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"can trolls not get fire resistance like in SLEX?"
